name: ProjectRPG
description:
Controls:  Azerty keyboards (alt + shift to switch on azerty if you are on qwerty )

-Q/D: Left and right

-Shift: Sprint

-Ctrl: crouch -> Slide if you are sprinting

-Space: Jump -> On wall: - no direction => jump on the opposite 

with direction => jump on the direction or detach from wall without jumping

Not useful: Attacks: -R is the bow attack and F the sword attack

Windowed mode recommended as we can't quit the application ingame

Bugs known: Wall jump does not turn the player on the correct direction
